en.firstTimeWelcome:
Welcome to {platform}!
English language detected.
You can change that from within the menu.
en.loaderContent:
In case of malfunctioning,
please make sure to put the .dll in
%appdata%/SparkTech.SDK/Scripts
en.languageUnknown:
Welcome to {platform}!
Your system language,
"{language}" is not supported by the SDK.
Default, English will be used.
You can change that from within the menu.

zh.firstTimeWelcome:
Welcome to {platform}!
Chinese language detected.
You can change that in the menu.
